book.synopsis: Twelve-year-old Jack Sawyer braves the mysterious dangers of the Territories, a surreal parallel world, in his quest--across the United States-for the Talisman, the only hope for his dying mother and for his own survival
book.dimensions: Height: 9.75 Inches, Length: 6.5 Inches, Weight: 2.35 Pounds, Width: 2 Inches
